s1: This course provides foundations and plenty of exercises in practical optimisation problems, while covering all basic elements of optimisation including forms of constraint programming as well as variations on linear programming and convex optimisation.
s2: This course introduces core concepts of data cleaning, standardisation, and data integration, that are aimed at converting and mapping raw data into other formats that allow more efficient and convenient use and analysis of data. The courses also discusses data quality, management, and storage issues as relevant to data analytics.

s1: Be able to apply Linear Programming and Mixed-Integer Programming model to solve real-world problems.
s2: Understand and be able to use advanced data wrangling, data integration, and database techniques as relevant to data analytics.

s1: Demonstrate an understanding of theoretical foundations of convex optimization and be able to use it to characterize optimal solutions to general problems.
